response: I'm not sure I could say much on that particular matter.
I'd consider myself a believer in the concept of small-goverment. This country has too many rules and regulations that only serve to hinder small businesses.
That said, when it comes to matters of the criminal nature, there's no question. Murder is murder, my friend. No way you're weasling outta that one.

text: Well, I suppose the level-headed thing to do is discuss the shotgun the kid used in the crime.
I suppose we should talk about the shotgun next.
